page.title: 15HEALTH.CALCOT,READING
page.content: The Calcot area is well provided for healthwise.There are doctors surgeries held regularly in all parts of Calcot and Tilehurst.Doctors in this area report that flu is still the most common complaint. However,dentist's clinics are nowhere as common as doctor's surgeries and in most cases local people must travel into Reading to find a dentist clinic. There are two large hospitals in Reading-The Royal Berkshire,and the Battle.These hospitals provide an excellent service for local people. There are also good visiting facilities in this area.Health visitors visit homes to monitor young children's progress,doctors and nurses visit schools to check children's health,and much provision is made for old people,both at home and in homes.
